entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:15 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -20.2°C

Observed at: Chibougamau Chapais Airport 11:37 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
